message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more around $1200000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $1300000. What do you think?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd like to try to get a better deal. Would you be willing to consider $1250000?
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $1280000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to try to get as close as possible to my target price. Would you be willing to meet me at $1230000?
I understand that you're trying to get as close as possible to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1260000. This is my next best offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your next best offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to try to get as close as possible to my target price. Would you be willing to meet me at $1210000?
I understand that you're trying to get as close as possible to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1240000. This is my next best offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your next best offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I've decided to make one final offer. Would you be willing to meet me at $1200000?
